channel.title: [FIXED] Getting Stuck in a truck
channel.description:
hostname: Black Mesa version : 100001/24 100001 insecure map : bm_c3a2a at: 3866 x, 359 y, -2346 z players : 1 humans, 0 bots (1 max) edicts : 897 used of 2048 max # userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 8 "Crafter0800" STEAM_ID_PENDING 1:00:00 15 0 active loopback
setpos 3866.063477 359.007690 -2346.837158;setang 3.200915 140.592865 0.000000
NOTE - co-ords are the position when the elevator has stopped moving, If you climb into the VERY back of the truck, you cannot get back out again. ![2015-07-24_00001.jpg|690x500](upload://dECNiZErZMFeCzQ0PWwVJKiVlSW.jpeg)
